subtitle: An advanced climate integration for Home Assistant that works with any existing thermostat entity
easy-install-explain: Versatile Thermostat is easily installed via HACS (Home Assistant Community Store). Once installed, you can configure your first thermostat in minutes thanks to our intuitive interface.
why-explain: Versatile Thermostat was designed to overcome the limitations of standard thermostats in Home Assistant. Our goal is to provide you with intelligent and efficient climate regulation that adapts to your specific needs.

features.compatibility: Compatible with heat pumps, valves and switches

cta.title: Ready to improve your heating system?
cta.desc: Join thousands of users who have already optimized their comfort and energy consumption

algo.title: Smart Power
algo.desc: Advanced calibration algorithms for optimal temperature precision. Automatic adjustment based on real conditions.

flex.title: Flexible Configuration
flex.desc: Intuitive configuration interface with many customizable options to adapt to all systems.

valve.title: Valve Control
valve.desc: Precise control of TRV valve opening with boost mode and anti-freeze support.

presence.title: Presence Detection
presence.desc: Detects the presence of occupants and adjusts the temperature during absences.

boiler.title: Central Boiler
boiler.desc: Supports automatic activation and deactivation of the central boiler.

power.title: Power Shedding
power.desc: For electric radiators, automatically reduces power to prevent the circuit breaker from tripping.
